Name: Handwoven Storage Basket - Natural
Short description: Beautiful handwoven storage basket made by Rwandan artisans
Description:
This stunning storage basket is handcrafted by skilled artisans in Rwanda using traditional weaving techniques passed down through generations. Made from natural sisal fibers, each basket features intricate patterns and exceptional durability.

Perfect for organizing your home while supporting artisan communities. Each purchase directly supports the weaver and their family.

Features:
• Handwoven by Rwandan artisans
• Natural sisal fibers
• Traditional weaving techniques
• Fair trade certified
• Each basket is unique

Dimensions: Approximately 35cm diameter x 30cm height
Materials: Natural sisal, colored cotton accents
Care: Spot clean with damp cloth

Name: Colorful Wall Basket - Small
Short description: Vibrant wall basket with traditional African patterns
Description:
Add a pop of color to your walls with this beautiful handwoven wall basket. Created by artisans in Rwanda, each basket features vibrant colors and traditional geometric patterns.

Perfect as wall art or functional storage. Hang in your living room, bedroom, or entryway for an artistic touch.

Features:
• Handwoven by Rwandan women artisans
• Vibrant dyed sisal fibers
• Traditional geometric patterns
• Lightweight and easy to hang
• Fair trade certified

Dimensions: 25cm diameter
Materials: Dyed sisal, woven cotton
Hanging: Small loop on back for easy mounting

Name: Kitchen Fruit Basket - Large
Short description: Spacious fruit basket perfect for kitchen countertops
Description:
This large handwoven basket is ideal for storing fruits, vegetables, or bread on your kitchen counter. The open weave allows air circulation to keep produce fresh longer.

Crafted by artisan cooperatives in Rwanda, each basket combines functionality with beautiful traditional design.

Features:
• Handwoven by artisan cooperatives
• Natural and colored sisal blend
• Open weave for air circulation
• Sturdy construction
• Food-safe materials
• Fair trade certified

Dimensions: 40cm diameter x 15cm height
Materials: Natural sisal with colored accents
Care: Wipe clean with damp cloth, air dry

Name: Woven Planter Basket
Short description: Stylish basket perfect for indoor plants
Description:
Transform your indoor plants into statement pieces with this beautiful woven planter basket. The natural sisal construction provides excellent drainage while adding organic texture to your space.

Handcrafted by Rwandan artisans, each basket supports sustainable livelihoods and preserves traditional weaving skills.

Features:
• Handwoven by Rwandan artisans
• Natural sisal construction
• Drainage-friendly weave
• Fits standard 6-8 inch pots
• Eco-friendly and sustainable

Dimensions: 30cm diameter x 25cm height
Materials: 100% natural sisal
Perfect for: Pothos, snake plants, peace lilies

Name: Traditional Bread Basket
Short description: Elegant bread basket for your dining table
Description:
This elegant bread basket brings warmth and tradition to your dining table. The tight weave keeps bread fresh while the beautiful design serves as a centerpiece.

Made by experienced weavers in Rwanda using techniques passed down through generations.

Features:
• Handwoven by master artisans
• Tight weave pattern
• Natural and colored sisal
• Traditional design
• Food-safe materials
• Fair trade certified

Dimensions: 35cm x 25cm x 10cm
Materials: Natural sisal with traditional dyed patterns
Care: Wipe with damp cloth, do not submerge in water

Name: Colorful Storage Basket Set
Short description: Set of 3 nested storage baskets in vibrant colors
Description:
Organize your home in style with this set of three nested storage baskets. Each basket features vibrant colors and traditional patterns, perfect for any room.

Handcrafted by women's cooperatives in Rwanda, supporting economic empowerment and skill preservation.

Features:
• Set of 3 nested baskets
• Small: 20cm, Medium: 25cm, Large: 30cm
• Vibrant traditional colors
• Stackable for easy storage
• Handwoven by women's cooperatives
• Fair trade certified

Materials: Dyed sisal fibers with cotton accents
Use for: Toys, accessories, bathroom items, craft supplies
Care: Spot clean with damp cloth
